1. Media
  2. Create Smart Playlist

Create Smart Playlist

Playlists are created to group videos.

  1. Select a Playlist type of Smart.
  2. Enter a Playlist Name.
  3. Check Show Playlist in Sidebar to have the playlist appear in the sidebar.
  5. Click Save.
